Responsible for ensuring the safe, efficient and effective delivery of Laminex products to our Metropolitan customer base. Managing a fleet of 20 company owned vehicles as well as additional taxi truck service providers. This role is required to identify and implement policies and procedures that ensure that an environment of continuous improvement is fostered and developed, whilst liaising with other departments to maintain effective communication channels. The Despatch Manager is to ensure that a culture and environment of zero harm is fostered and maintained.

This is a leadership role; hence this role sets the tone for the associated team.  The Despatch Manager is required to establish a high performance culture by providing leadership, direction, motivation, coaching and support to direct reports and the overall warehouse teams.

This position is responsible and accountable for ensuring the timely and efficient coordination of all NSS transport operations.  Responsible for ensuring all tasks are completed in accordance with standard operation procedures, policies and cost effectiveness.

•	Coordinate transport operations for project cargo in conjunction with the Depot Manager. .
•	Oversee staffing levels and hours for local truck drivers and subcontractors.
•	Conduct and document regular safety & operational tool box meetings with NSS truck drivers.
•	Participate in and follow up on incident investigations.
•	Manage QUDOS requirements e.g. enter all incidents and accidents.
•	Assist in the review of procedures to ensure continuous improvement, which deliver increased accuracy, efficiency and integrity and integration with other NSS Departments
•	Ensure customer relations and communications are maintained at all times.
•	Work with NSSPL to maintain its quality certification.

general.headline: 6500 + Followers
general.school: St Peters Clayton, Noble Park Technical College & Dandenong Technical College
general.description:
A rewarding business development role in sales or marketing that allows me to grow the company through the use of strategic partnerships and customer networks.
Results driven individual with a verifiable track record of delivering complex projects on time and within budget. Able to combine a strong business acumen with an ability to conceive profitable and efficient solutions utilizing technology and strategic business re-engineering.

Proven track record that demonstrates self-motivation, creativity and initiative to achieve both personal and corporate goals. 

 I have been engaged in developing and selling a broad range of emergency response services to corporate fleet operators across Australia. Particularly, I have extensive experience in the delivery of a GPS solution which incorporates call centre and on-road emergency response. I have achieved this end-to-end solution by fostering significant channel partner relationships with organisations spanning all facets of the heavy vehicle, logistics solutions, chain management, dangerous goods, supply chain solutions, transport operations,  IT and business services industries.

In the last 10 years my role has shifted to focus on compliance based solutions for the Transport sector that covers Regulatory Telematics, Intelligent Access Program (IAP), Chain of Responsibility (COR), Electronic Work Diary (EWD), On Board Mass (OBM), Fatigue Management, C-ITS and related initiatives.  

My management experience has been gained in the context of a large, national company with rapidly-growing business lines. I have experience in developing relationships with clients ranging from large ASX listed companies through to Government departments, and am comfortable presenting at Board level.

jobs.jobTitle: Regulatory Telematics, Commercial Telematics IoT, C-ITS, V2V, V2I, V2E & M2M
jobs.description:
I am a passionate and enthusiastic professional who has a vast amount of experience in the Automotive Refinishing, Panel Shops, Smash Repairs Management, Signage & Branding, Emergency Response, Commercial Telematics, GPS Tracking, C- ITS, ITS, Regulatory Telematics, IoT, IoE, M2M and the Heavy Vehicle Transport Sector.  

In the last decade my role encompassed GPS Tracking, Intelligent Access Program (IAP), Fatigue Management (FM), Electronic Work Diary (EWD), On Board Mass (OBM), Internet of Things (IoT), Corporative Intelligent Transport Systems (C- ITS), M2M (Machine to Machine), Job Dispatch, Trailer Tracking, Refrigerated Monitoring, DVR Camera Solutions, Personal Tracking, Emergency Response and related solutions have been gained over numerous years.

Over the years I have cemented my position as a specialist in the regulatory environment for transport in Australia, with in- depth knowledge of The Intelligent Access Program (IAP), Cooperative Intelligent Transport Systems (CITS), Regulatory Type Approval Process, the pending Electronic Work Diary (EWD), Intelligent Speed Compliance (ISC), Driverless Vehicles, Connected Vehicles and new reform as the up and coming Road User Charging (RUC).

Over and above I have gained knowledge and excelled in the following areas:

•	Management
•	Leadership
•	Sales, Business Development, Account Management, Channel Management & Customer retention 
•	Marketing including designs and go to market campaigns 
•	Trade Show concepts and launches 
•	Tenders 
•	Presentations and Public Speaking 
•	Motivation and Emotional Intelligence

jobs.jobTitle: Sales Executive (Regulatory Telematics, Commercial Telematics IoT, C-ITS, V2V, V2I, V2E & M2M)

jobs.description:
BIGmate is a nationally recognized company with global reach. We work with some of Australia’s largest companies to provide tracking solutions for cost efficiencies, improved service delivery, increased throughput and staff safety. 

With offices and partners in various locations in Australia and Overseas, we’re easily accessible to help you find the best GPS tracking and monitoring solution to meet your specific needs.

At BIGmate, we provide cutting edge solutions and at all times strive for industry best practice, by:

•	Ensuring safety and well-being of employees as our first consideration.
•	Documenting and maintaining an effective Quality Management System.
•	Effective communication of this policy and related quality procedures and to all employees and other stakeholders.
•	Training and development of our employees.
•	Compliance with applicable laws, regulations, standards and other requirements.
•	Continual improvement of our technologies, service and performance by setting measurable objectives and targets to support both customer needs and the business goals of our stakeholders.

Telematics is the fast-growing industry delivering increased productivity for industry through GPS technologies, vehicle tracking and asset management; BIGmate is at the forefront of Australia’s telematics field in product development and innovation.

We tailor our GPS monitoring solutions to client need, while the other operators may only provide off-the-shelf, one-size-fits-all packages.

Our in-house team of developers have created a comprehensive and responsive GPS monitoring solution.

Everybody wins simply because BIGmate products lead the way in terms of functionality, user-friendliness and customisation.”

BIGmate is one of the leading innovators in the global field of GPS tracking and asset
      management technology. Over more than 14 years, BIGmate has established a proven
      record in the provision of cutting-edge GPS tracking and productivity solutions to a
      
      broad range of industries and markets.

jobs.jobTitle: Head of MiX RoadCheck & Special Projects Manager - (Australasia)
jobs.description:
When I joined MiX Telematics it was to build a complete Transport offering for the Transport market with a major focus on compliance. To that effect, I was proud the deliver MiX RoadCheck in Feb 2014. 

MiX RoadCheck is an end-to-end road transport compliance solution, designed for operators of heavy fleets in Australia. The integrated solution enables customers to meet all of their regulatory and compliance requirements as well as their commercial business needs.

The innovative, telematics solution was developed using best-of-breed technology as well as through strategic industry partnerships.

Intelligent Access Program (IAP) services are available through Black Box Control, which is a
partner of MiX Telematics. The MiX RoadCheck solution also incorporates comprehensive Fatigue, Maintenance and Mass Management as well as Personal Tracking features and functionality. The solution makes use of an innovative, easy to use, feature-rich tracking platform.

MiX RoadCheck also has tools and apps for fleet drivers to perform all of their compliance-related
tasks. Monitoring and ensuring that each trip is compliant is made easy using the solution - both for
the driver and the business.

Through world-class fleet management and vehicle tracking technology, MiX
      Telematics enables the effective management of mobile assets. MiX Telematics’ core
      offering lies in the provision of information and related services for both privately
      
      owned vehicles and the commercial fleet sector.

... See more

ProconMRM Pacific is powered by Procon Inc., the world's leading provider of reliable Mobile Resource Management (MRM) solutions.  
The focus is on maximizing the efficiency of your mobile assets. The FleetLocate and other Procon solutions allow you to effortlessly protect, connect and control your mobile assets around the clock, via the web and mobile phones.  
Locally and globally, Procon currently tracks and monitors over 1 million vehicles, including vans, trucks and other mobile resources.

Coynes Freight Management Group is a large container transport business located at the Port of Melbourne, they have been in operation for over 63 years.  One of the few remaining family owned and run business in Victoria.

general.headline: Owner, Silverback Cargo Care
general.description:
Silverback Container Management provides a unique service to the transport and shipping
      industry for all aspects of domestic container logistics. We work with our customers to
      
      provide the most cost-effective solutions for container flow imbalances nationally.

jobs.description:
Silverback Cargo Care is a supplier of equipment and consumables to the transport, shipping, warehouse and mining industries. We service customers Australia wide from our Sydney, Melbourne, Brisbane and Auckland branches.

www.silverback.com.au

SYDNEY
Unit 2, 1009 Canley Vale Rd, Wetherill Park 2164 NSW, Australia

MELBOURNE
86 Strzelecki Ave, Sunshine West 3020 VIC, Australia 

BRISBANE
Unit 1, 12 Boolarra St, Hemmant 4174 QLD, Australia 

AUCKLAND
300 Richmond Road, Grey Lynn 1147 P.O.Box 46018 Auckland, New Zealand

No matter which major shipping line you talk to, the conservative view is that globally at least USD $15 billion annually is being spent to reposition empty containers. About two thirds of this cost results from imbalances where cargo loads are simply one way centric. The other one third is carrier-specific, where the cargo can by definition only be sent one way. 

All carriers understand these issues but may not have the available resource to readily acquire new business back-load cargo. This is where Silverback can assist your company. Many major shipping lines, leasing companies and freight forwarders are currently dealing with Silverback Container Management. For over 20 years Silverback have been successfully reducing repositioning costs for its customers by providing a neutral container interchange network with monitoring systems.

If your organisation is interested in further reducing its empty container repositioning costs talk to Silverback. Our integrated system opens up domestic as well as global possibilities to reposition your equipment efficiently and cost effectively as well as providing you with one way equipment that was previously out of reach.

Thus converting an asset management cost to asset utilisation.

Working alongside product planning & sales teams as well as contractors to ensure accurate & timely delivery of products.
Providing weekly & monthly reports to management using Excel, Word, PowerPoint, Oracle and Outlook.

Managing and analysing tier one customer demand schedules.

Administrate numerous customer web-based programmes.

jobs.description:
After my two previous roles in 3PL I wanted a new challenge and see the logistics from
      an in house operation.
      

    Highlights so far have seen a doubling of productivity on out bound and planning and
      
      managing relocation to greenfield site.

• Took up the role of Operations Manager, a position with direct profit and loss responsibility.
• Oversaw the provision of warehousing for FMCG customers in the fashion and convenience industries.
• Responsible for warehouse management, staff management, logistics governance, supply chain operations, customer relationship management, physical security, internal auditing, inventory control.
• Led teams of up to 90 logistics staff, including authoring the business plan, communicating the plan to the team, determining logistics priorities, setting team goals, allocating resources and monitoring delivery of logistics services on a daily basis.
• Conducted business and LEAN reviews that resulted in costs reductions improvements through better allocation of staff and management of work hours and productivity improvements for changing the process and gaining effiencies.
• Implemented a cyclic counting process that improved the accuracy of inventory accounting practices.
• Monitored all invoicing and accounts payable processes.
• Preparation and review of outgoing invoices. process and approval of incoming invoice. 
• Contributed to planning and development of a new warehouse to cover 3PL operations.

• Originally joined as the Site Facility Manager and later asked to take up the role of Operations Manager, a position with direct profit and loss responsibility.
• Oversaw the provision of warehousing and transport services to sensitive fright providers catering to the needs of several telecommunications companies.
• Responsible for warehouse management, staff management, logistics governance, supply chain operations, customer relationship management, physical security, internal auditing, inventory control and transport operations.
• Led teams of up to 20 logistics staff, including authoring the business plan, communicating the plan to the team, determining logistics priorities, setting team goals, allocating resources and monitoring delivery of logistics services on a daily basis.
• Managed critical supply chain services for medical equipment that was often dispatched at very short notice.
• Conducted business reviews that resulted in costs reductions through better allocation of staff and management of work hours.
• Implemented a cyclic counting process that improved the accuracy of inventory accounting practices.
• Reviewed supplier agreements and negotiated new commercial terms that resulted in ongoing cost savings and greater revenues.
• Monitored all invoicing and accounts payable processes.
• Preparation and review of outgoing invoices. process and approval of incoming invoice. 
• Oversaw national distribution and recovery projects encompassing transportation of specialist equipment such as cranes, four wheel drives, helicopters and barges. 
• Contributed to planning and development of a new warehouse to cover 3PL, Sensitive Freight and Freight Forwarding operations.

jobs.description:
1. Identifying new sales leads
2. Pitching products and/or services
3. Maintaining fruitful relationships with existing customers

When it comes to generating leads, day-to- day duties typically include:
 Researching organisations and individuals online (especially on social media) to identify new leads and potential new markets
 Researching the needs of other companies and learning who makes decisions about purchasing
 Contacting potential clients via email or phone to establish rapport and set up meetings
 Planning and overseeing new marketing initiatives
 Attending conferences, meetings, and industry events

When it comes to the challenge of actually selling, typical duties include:
 Preparing PowerPoint presentations and sales displays
 Contacting clients to inform them about new developments in the company’s products
 Developing quotes and proposals
 Negotiating and renegotiating by phone, email, and in person
 Developing sales goals for the team and ensuring they are met
 Training personnel and helping team members develop their skills

Source, interview, and select applicants for IT (technical) positions.
      

    Handling Linkedin to source people for hiring
      

    Meet with hiring managers to determine job duties.
      

    
      Match applicants to job openings.

... See more

general.headline: SEO & Social Media Firm 7+, Tech Blogger, Investor | Entrepreneur Extraordinaire
general.description:
“SEO” Search engine optimization expert and Brand development, Increase traffic on website, Page rank improvement, Design website UI and UX. I am also helping to my clients get ranked higher in Search engines like Google and Yahoo. 

My name is Vijay Rajbhar and I am a full-time SEO consultant with over ten years’ experience. Since 2006, I have delivered over one hundred & fifty successful SEO audits and campaigns to clients. Not only do I help businesses succeed online, I also walk the talk and have profitable business websites of my own.

Prior to full-time SEO, I was a successful brand marketer within the corporate and SME markets. Before that I held senior sales and marketing positions. 

The key to my success is that I take a personal interest and treat a customer’s business as I would my own. I never take a chance with a client’s business and I work within the guidelines set out by Google. My track record is first class and personal references from business owners are readily available.

My key skills focus on:

SEO Audit, Keyword Research, Technical and marketing advice on what you need to change to move up the rankings for your products and services in all search engine.
Competitor Analysis. Comparing your website to your successful competitors to identify the elements you need to focus on most.
Website Promotion. Delivering the content, link building and social media elements you need to increase traffic and business.

SEO Professional: 

Link Building, Website Content, Website Structures, Web Analyisis, Cometitior Analysis, Website Auditing, Social Media, Branding, Natural Positioning in Various Search Engine, CMS Customaization, Landing Page Optimisation, Google Adwords, Google Analytics, Social Engagement, Online Interaction, Online Marketing, Ecommerce Marketing, Wordpress SEO, Blogging

Feel free to get in touch to find out how I can help your web business to grow
Email: vijay.d.rajbhar@live.com

jobs.description:
•	RECRUITING STAFF - This includes developing job descriptions and person specifications, preparing job advertisments, checking application forms, short listing, interviewing, negotiating salaries and selecting candidates.

HANDLING OPERATIONS such as:
•	Developing and implementing policies on issues like working conditions, performance management, equal opportunities, disciplinary procedures and absence management.
